jobDescription: Are you looking to start a career in the music industry? A prestigious music licensing company is seeking an entry level copyright data analyst to join their team. Position entails database matching of song and release details using on-line research of song and release information. Data review and update for database of music administration records. Service Customer Inquiries as required. Heavy Volume - deadline driven.Qualifications / Requirements:  Working knowledge of various artists, music genres, styles and terminology strongly preferred. Music publishing administration experience preferred. Music degree preferred. Data entry experience with strong computer navigation and keyboarding skills required. Ability to type at least 60 wpm required. Good verbal and written communication skills. Position: Company offers a full benefits package including health, dental and 401(k).
